name: MandalOs
short_description:
Inspired by a project to use Doom as a GUI for Linux, the intention of MandalOs is to provide a natural and intuitive graphical environment for organizing and creating data.
MandalOs will depart from the defacto-standard of square grid arrays and instead utilize fractal circular geometry, use meta-data for self organization and holographic principals to quickly and efficiently present relevant data.
For effective interfacing between machine and human, an energetic model of the human being is to be used as the basis for encoding data. The system can thus be seen essentially as a Human Experience Resynthesizer.
Principal usage will be for Real-time Art Content Creation.
Parralel processing (GPU) will be a critical element in the implementation of this system. Even then, the goal of this project may fall outside the scope of what is possible with digital computing, in which case the system becomes a model basis for an analog/holographic computer.
summary: Data management and creation system based on holographic principals.
